law.text: No driver shall deceive or attempt to deceive any passenger who may ride in his taxicab, or who may desire to ride in such taxicab as to his destination or the rate of fare to be charged, or shall convey any passenger, or cause him to be conveyed, to a place other than directed by him. In no event shall any operator providing premium service take a longer route to the destination than necessary, unless so requested by the passenger. (Code 1959 , ยง22-19)
